t: Amazon.com: Masterbuilt 20070210, 30 inch, MB20070210 Analog Electric Smoker with 3 Smoking Racks, 30" Black (Old Version) : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: Thinking that this might still ... I guess Masterbuilt knows this thing won't last. A quick check online shows that the element is around $20 - $25 and the controller is $45, OUCH! I initially really liked this smoker, and had recommended it to others, now I would tell them not to buy it due to it's poor quality and expensive repairs. While this smoker has a lot going for it, I would recommend someone shopping look for a more reliable brand...
